thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 14 of 539
thread.title: Allison

author: Allison
title: Allison
text: The dress I ordered looked amazing in the picture on the model who looked about my size, height, etc. The dress was too big in the chest, and way too short... the model was said to be 5'9'' in the photo, which is my same height. The dress was over an inch off the ground around my ankles. Based off the sizing chart and length of the dress described in the photos I'm scared to order off here again... Dresses should be made longer. Shorter girls can get dresses hemmed but taller girls are just out of luck.
